title: What's the cheapest source for a small DIY 3D printer kit? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gearbest China Anet A8 this is my opinion and only because it was the kit I bought. Not it is not as good as the Prusa I would have bought if I could of afforded it.
Here is a video reviewing cheap diy printers for beginners 10 Best Cheap 3D Printers for Beginners To Print Anything
